info.Changelogs:
Update ver1.3.5 changelogs
1-fixes syncing issues
2-added ability to backup and restore data without syncing
3-improved loading times overall
            
4-fixes random freezes

6-fixes the issue not getting notifcations from subscribed animes
7-fixes some aired animes crashes
8- enhanced ocean theme colors
9-video postion wont changes upon quality switching
